message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'd like to try to get a better deal.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $90?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $87? I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure I can afford it.
